other_tests.procedure_name: CT Scan of the Abdomen and Pelvis
other_tests.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis at lung bases bilaterally, mildly enlarged heart, small axial hiatal hernia, gynecomastia. Hypodensity along liver dome (10 x 13 mm), scattered areas of fatty deposition in hepatic parenchyma. Right renal hyperdense lesion (1.9 x 2.0 cm), a hypodense renal mid pole lesion (3.2 x 2.6 cm, likely simple cyst), and a small hypodensity in the right renal lower pole (11 x 10 mm, incompletely characterized). Punctate calcific density in right kidney compatible with a non-obstructing stone. Abnormal appearance of the appendix (12 mm in diameter, does not fill with oral contrast) with periappendiceal fat stranding, compatible with acute uncomplicated appendicitis.
